title: Hollywood Scandal Spreads, How Trump's Tax Plan Screws You 10.18.17
itunes:title: Hollywood Scandal Spreads, How Trump's Tax Plan Screws You 10.18.17
description:
In episode 8, Jack & Miles are joined by writer and comedian Jackie Koppell to discuss Hollywood scandals, trickle down economics, Trump's tax plan, and more. Plus five stories they're keeping an eye on.
